name: Prima Development Group
tagline: Dedicated Development Teams delivering IT solution
description:
Prima DG is a global IT company that delivers effective mobile solutions and professional software development services.
With headquarters in London, United Kingdom, and development office in Zaporizhzhya, Ukraine, Prima DG has been providing businesses all over the world with dedicated development teams since 2001.

Cooperation with Prima DG guarantees the highest development quality using unique experience of our talented specialists and decreasing project costs due to nearshore location and advanced IT infrastructure.
